title: VR-Based Programming Algorithm Learning Course

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: A programming algorithm education course for pre-service/in-service teachers, integrating multiple learning styles (visual, auditory, kinesthetic, reading) using VR technology

learning_goals: Visually analyze and explain the operating principles of sorting, traversal, and recursive algorithms in a VR environment
Reconstruct step-by-step algorithm execution processes through virtual simulations and physical interactions (hand controller manipulation)
Efficiently solve at least three types of algorithm problems using educational VR applications
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
